content:
Business Travel

  • Corporate Rate Package
  • Area Businesses
  • Group Travel Request

Attention all Start-Ups and Small Companies!

Corporate Rates At Our NoMad Hotel

Looking for a way to save money for your company, and cannot commit to a minimum number of room nights?  We have a solution!

STAY in our brand new Art Nouveau inspired guest rooms,

WORK hard cultivating your small business,

and PLAY even harder in the exciting, trend-setting NoMad neighborhood of New York.  

As we continue to amplify your guest experience, enjoy up to 20% off of the best available rate by clicking on this link or mentioning CORP when making your reservation at our NoMad Hotel.

Our boutique New York hotel has five room categories and suites to choose from – all complemented with luxurious plush beds, Frette Linens, white porcelain bathroom with Lefroy Brooks fixtures, custom furniture, and C.O. Bigelow bath amenities.

Our Corporate Rate includes:

  • Free Wi-Fi in guest rooms and public spaces
  • Complimentary lobby coffee from 7 am - 10 am
  • Complimentary early morning pastries
  • Early Check-in upon availability
  • Late Check-out upon availability
  • Welcome amenity waiting in your room upon arrival
  • 24-hour modern fitness center
  • Available upon request, $25 day passes to 24 Hour Fitness Ultra-Sport Gym located on 5th Avenue

Book now and save!
